page.title: 19Public Houses.
page.content: There are only two public houses in this area. {The Dog and Hedgehog, Dadlington. This is a large,old but modernized building.There is a restaurant and rooms available for private parties. It is a popular place,and the restaurant has a good reputation.This place is not only frequented by locals but is sought by people from nearby towns. {The Nags Head, Stapleton. This is a small,old fashioned pub,which is about 400 years old. It does not provide bar meals. It is mainly used by local people.
